intro: Beat the clock, tame her wrath, save the day.
description:
When a woman gets angry, the world trembles - windows shatter, volcanoes erupt, and people cower in fear! It’s your job to save the world by taming her tantrums. In this fast-paced puzzle game, you race against the clock to arrange comic-style illustrations using subtle hints, piecing together the chain of events that sparked each meltdown.

A puzzle game like no other - blending sharp humor with clever mechanics. With comic-book flair, pin-up sass, and beautifully animated sequences, the game drops you into a gallery of scenarios that are sometimes hilariously absurd, sometimes uncomfortably relatable.

It’s part puzzle-solving, part comedy of errors - a mix that keeps you guessing, laughing, and sometimes cringing at just how familiar it all feels. A perfect icebreaker game - entertaining not just for players, but also for anyone watching!

FEATURES:

- Unique fast-paced puzzle gameplay: under a ticking clock, decode the hints, line up the illustrations, and watch the tantrum take shape

- 150+ hilarious tantrum scenarios from absurd misunderstandings to relatable everyday conflicts - spanning date nights, family matters, parties, gaming nights and plenty more

- Absurd yet painfully relatable situations that will make you either howl from secondhand embarrassment or laugh at their sheer stupidity

- Three distinct playable characters, each with their own quirks, personality, and tantrum triggers

- Balanced humor: lightheartedly pokes fun at stereotypes for both men and women

- Stylish visuals blending comic book flair with retro pin-up aesthetics

- Beautifully animated comic book sequences that bring every meltdown to life

- Hidden ending: sometimes even failure has a silver lining - your choices and “mistakes” can unlock unexpected outcomes.
